Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on viral photographs circulating on social media without any substantial evidence or verification.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photographs are not all of the Babri masjid, as confirmed by Alt News.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photographs by stating they are from the British Library, when in reality, only one photograph is confirmed to be from there.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by including photographs that are not related to the Babri masjid, thus misleading the audience.
Problematic assumption: There is no clear problematic assumption in the provided claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation exists in the form of Alt News' findings, which confirm that most of the photographs are not of the Babri masjid.
